name: Athens Development and Destination Management Agency
legal: Development Agency - SA Local Authorities Public Interest Private Company
goal:
Athens Development and Destination Management Agency (ADDMA) is a private legal entity of public interest with the Municipality of Athens being its main stakeholder.

ADDMA aims at the design and implementation of policies and programs regarding:
- Enterpreneurship
- Tourism
- Social and Solidarity Economy and Social Entrepreneurship
- Social Policy
- European Programs
- Connection of Research and Development with the market and municipality of Athens
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Entrepreneurship
Social and Solidarity Economy
Social entrepreneurship
Social Policy
Refugee Integration
Research and Development
